text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Here we are! Miho no Matsubara! Oho,
look at this bakushining view of Mt.
Fuji!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And… could that be the pine tree where
the celestial maiden is said to have
hung her feathered robe?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I see! It does look like a great place 
for drying laundry!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: — By the way, Mihono Matsubara… How's this place related to Bourbon, I wonder?
